Class FilePanelTableImp

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  wjhk.jupload2.gui.filepanel.FilePanelTableImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, FilePanel
public class FilePanelTableImp
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements FilePanel

Implementation of the FilePanel : it creates the FilePanelJTable, and handles the necessary functionalities.

Version:
$Revision: 577 $
Author:
William JinHua Kwong
